name: FRIGUL
description:
FRIGŮL is a local multiplayer game for 2 (1v1) or 4 players (2v2). It was initially designed for the Global Game Jam 2019. Its theme what home means to you inspired us to make a fun physics base game where players control removal men who have to unload their truck faster than their opponent.

Controls

Controllers are mandatory!

Stick Left: Move your left hand
Stick Right: Move your right hand
Left Bumper (LB): Grab with your left hand
Right Bumper (RB) Grab with your right hand

Your character will follow your hands!

Have Fun!

We hope you'll have as much fun as we did when we created this game :)

-The Gůntlemen
